WorkItem.ClosedComment: User needs to add the item
WorkItem.Description: It does not seem as though the Barbed Ymirheim Choker from heroic Pit of Saron is in the Rawr item database (at least for DKs).

Comments.Message: Rawr is not missing any items. See the readme.

As it turns out the Barbed Ymirheim Choker is incorrectly marked as Alliance-only on the WoW Armory, which is why it is not listed.  You have to edit the item and make it available to both factions, then restart Rawr.  The same is true of the Arcane Loops of Anger from Heroic PoS.
Arcane Loops of Anger are from Heroic FoS (was typing too quickly).
